CAREER SUMMARY
2019 to date: Westcon UK&I – Bracknell UK
Position: Palo Alto Networks Pre-Sales
Westcon is a value-added technology distributor of category-leading solutions in Security and recently won the Palo Alto Networks EMEA & APAC distributor of the year.
His role, working with the account managers, is to technically qualify sales opportunities, deliver partner enablement, demonstrations and support the partner community, whilst delivering Security Lifecycle Reviews (SLRs) and Best Practise Assessments (BPAs).
Achievements & Responsibilities:
Architect Palo Alto Networks solutions, creating Bill of Materials (BoM) and quotations.
Build vendor / distributor / partner relationships with the Westcon vendor & partner network.
Deliver partner and staff enablement, in addition to running evaluations and proof of concepts.
Engage with marketing and help with campaigns, leveraging my experience with the partner network.
Identify security opportunities with the UC account managers / partners and starting a development plan.
Won the Westcon Pre-Sales engineer of the year award.
“His strong knowledge of the vendor sector (cybersecurity) makes his ability to learn other complimentary products high and this is something that I feel he has a natural interest in doing – his passion for his subject is clear. A consummate Professional” Pre-Sales Manager, Westcon.
Palo Alto Networks Cortex XDR & XSOAR partner webinar enablement series.
“BTW, I really enjoyed your call yesterday. Great positioning and your delivery was superb!”. Manager, Distribution and Channel, Western Europe. Palo Alto Networks
“Just wanted to say well done and thank you for this morning. Pitched at a really good level. Like the Managing Director, I am not technical, and I took a lot from this, so thanks again.” Head of Sales, Westcon.
Palo Alto Networks enablement guide he created for partners to help understand the path to compliance.
“Many thanks Allen, he makes the enablement planning massively straightforward to follow”. Head of Technical Pre-Sales.” Global Telecoms Provider.
2018 – 2019 Nettitude Ltd
Position: Infrastructure Pre-Sales Consultant
Nettitude is an award-winning provider of cyber security, compliance, managed security services, infrastructure and incident response services to organisations.
Achievements & Responsibilities:
First Palo Alto Networks BoM was for 11x firewalls with subscriptions; Panorama; 250xTraps; 3yr option.
In his first quarter, he generated and helped deliver £8,650GM of professional services consultancy.
He increased the customer meetings by 86% generating multiple leads across the portfolio.
Wrote a business case why Nettitude should be selling a manged WAF solution using Incapsula.
Provided hands on sales training and sessions to help upskill the sales staff into strategic solution selling.
Aggregate Industries Zero-Trust Session(s)
“Great feedback internally from the session with Allen, lots of corridor discussions afterwards. Phil, our network analyst, very fired up by some of the suggestions and found it very interesting. I'm waiting to hear how they want to proceed with SLR. The best hour we've spent this week.” Head of IT Business Systems & Security, Aggregate Industries.
“£23,472.50 – Aggregate Industries – (PEN) Testing Schedule.  Big shout out to Allen who helped demonstrate value add on this one, earlier this week Allen did a session with Aggregates Inf team to help advise on the se

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
